alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 08 at 4:09PM AKST until February 10 at 1:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THURSDAY TO 1 PM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...From 4 PM Thursday to 1 PM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could reduce visibility to one quarter mile or less at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will spread into the Pribilofs Thursday afternoon and evening as northeast winds increase and persist through Friday morning. The worst conditions and strongest winds are expected for Saint George, with falling snow expected to remain much lighter towards Saint Paul.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel very hazardous. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.
